about.title: About the Festival
about.description: A day of celebration of diversity and queer music in Barcelona. A unique experience that brings together the LGTBIQ+ community through art and music.

values.title: Our Values
values.diversityDesc: We celebrate all gender identities and expressions
values.artDesc: Music as a tool for social change
